discover.confirmRequest: Please confirm that you want to borrow this book. When you confirm, there will be a new message section opening a new dialogue with the owner. So you can communicate with them about the details of receiving the book.
discover.label: Discover
discover.requestSent: The book is requested from the owner

requests.blockDescription: Please confirm you want to block this user
requests.handedMessage: The book is handed over to the requester

profile.addBookConfirm: Please confirm that you own this book and want to add to your virtual shelf here

profile.bookDeleted: Book is deleted from your virtual shelf

settings.addLanguages: Add languages you can read books in and confirm
settings.deleteAccountAlert: If you approve, your account and all information, including your books, messaging and information about you, will be permanently deleted. Do you approve of this?
settings.label: Settings
settings.locationLoading: Please stay in the page. This may take a little bit longer than few seconds...
settings.locationNotice: For Librella, it is required to set your location to be able to find your nearest libraries.
settings.locationNotice2: Your location will only be saved once now. Therefore it's a good idea to be near or around your library.
